featured.text: It rained so hard yesterday that the baseball game had to be until next Saturday.

definition.zh_def: 星期六，通常是工作周的第六天，許多人在這一天休息或進行休閒活動。
definition.en_def: Saturday, the sixth day of the week, often regarded as a day for rest or leisure activities.
definition.example: I like to go hiking on Saturday.
